author: wdownes
title: Liverpool fancy £20million Bundesliga hotshot Emil Forsberg despite RB Leipzig star’s last nightmare match
text:
RED ALL OVER Liverpool fancy £20million Bundesliga hotshot Emil Forsberg despite RB Leipzig star’s last nightmare match 
Forsberg's last showing lasted just 30 minutes after he was sent off in the 3-0 defeat to Bayern Munich for a spiteful tackle on Philipp Lahm with his side already two down by WALLY DOWNES JR
